name: 【SP #36】靈光酒吧｜Idea Bar
description:
【夢境故事】

我是這小鎮的牛仔警長，守護著它的安寧。鎮上有一酒吧，此地或似輕鬆緩慢，或似酒醉迷離，酒客們悠遊於天馬行空的思維，點子如雲般湧現，創意縈繞其中。是何等奇妙的酒精啊，能如此激發創造力，讓我深思其中的真諦。

－

【Dream Story】

I am the cowboy sheriff of this little town, guarding its peace and tranquility. In the heart of the town lies a bar, where time seems to slow down and the patrons are lost in a haze of intoxication. Here, thoughts roam free, and ideas flow like a river, spiraling into a realm of infinite creativity. Oh, the wonder of alcohol, to kindle such a flame of inspiration and make me ponder its true essence.
